snippet: A Yemeni border guard shot and killed three men who were wearing women’s veils as they tried to cross into Saudi Arabia with a male driver on Saturday, officials said.
lead_paragraph: A Yemeni border guard shot and killed three men who were wearing women’s veils as they tried to cross into Saudi Arabia with a male driver on Saturday, officials said.

headline.main: Yemen: Militants Killed in Shootout at Saudi Border
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Militants Killed in Shootout at Saudi Border
